Title: Son of the Defender
Plot: A man with a grudge against Denny Crane and his late father take the firm hostage, while Alan Shore ends up in jail for contempt of court while defending a prostitute.
GuestStars: Kurt Scholler,  Marcus Folmar,  Karen Lew,  Barry Sigismondi,  Alexandra Burkhart,  Stacey Moseley,  Patricia Mizen,  Randy Thompson,  Bonnie Bailey-Reed,  Billy Mayo,  James Keane,  Jackie Debatin,  Lawrence Pr
